name: Assassin Sniper 3: City Missio
description:
Assassin Sniper 3: City Mission is an army assassin sniper shooting game where you will become a Special Forces elite sniper. Terrorists occupied the city, creating chaos in the city, threatening innocent people. You accept the army's mission, go to the front, destroy the city's terrorists, and restore the city's peace.
Features
• Realistic Environment.
• Thrilling action levels.
• New and latest Sniper 3D Guns.
• High quality graphics and best sound effects
• HD Graphics.
• Sniper Training to be the Best Shooter
